medical_history.chief_complaint: Persistent fatigue and mild problems with short-term memory.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reported persistent fatigue and mild problems with short-term memory that had not changed over time, with no seizures. Her symptoms began after a cesarean section 12 years earlier when she presented with a generalized tonic-clonic seizure.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of oligodendroglioma, traumatic subdural hematoma requiring evacuation 17 years prior, and asthma.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had cancer involving lymph nodes and received chemotherapy; a sister had a tumor of unknown type removed from her neck; a daughter has attention deficitâ€“hyperactivity disorder. There is also a family history of hypothyroidism.
medical_history.social_history: Lives with her husband and children; does not smoke, drink alcohol, or use illicit drugs.
